hanzi-su-wiki:
懐

Значения

Грудь, карман; полюбить; вспоминать с любовью; милый, дорогой

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Грудь. Защищает сердце 忄, как ресница — глаз 罒, а платье 衣 — тело.

Варианты

懷, 怀
purpleculture_pinyin:
huái
Japanese variant of 怀
Японский вариант Хуай
rtega_mnemonic:
懷懷RS
怀怀		懐bosom, breast, carry in bosom
  • the heart 忄 is carried in the bosom 褱
  • ⓢ person crossing hands 不 to protect his heart 忄 located in the bosom
  • modf. 懷 → 懐
heisig_constituent: pocket, Freud, state of mind, poltergeist, BernaE, ten, needle, eye, cross-eyed, net, top hat, scarf, cloth, clothes, clothing, garment
heisig_story: State of mind . . . needle . . . eyes . . . garment.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: pocket, feelings, heart, yearn, miss someone, become attached to, bosom, breast
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Карман, чувство, сердце, тоскует, мисс кто-то, привязывается к, груди, груди
koohiiStory1: (re: taijuando) When you are in New York City you have to be alert, i.e. in the "New York State of Mind": you need ten eyes to make sure no one will go through your garments and pick your pockets.
koohiiStory2: Imagine Darth Vader´s state of mind when he discovers his garment has not pockets. " D O NOT WANT!".
kunYomi: ふところ、なつ.かしい、なつ.かしむ、なつ.く、なつ.ける、なず.ける、いだ.く、おも.う
jp_example_words:
懐く(なつく): to become emotionally attached
懐かしい(なつかしい): dear, desired, missed
jp_readingExamples: 懐かしい (なつ.かしい), 懐かしむ (なつ.かしむ), 懐く (なつ.く), 懐ける (なつ.ける), 懐 (ふところ)
WaniKani_Radicals: 忄, 十, 罒, 衣
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Your soul will cross through your body and into the net of your clothes so that you'll be hit with nostalgia when you wear them again. Nostalgia for all the things that happened every single time you wore those clothes.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: When you put on an old piece of clothing, a shirt maybe, or some pants, feel the nostalgia that was embedded in it and left there by your soul.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This nostalgia ties knots (なつ) in your stomach and your chest. Even if the memories and feelings weren't particularly bad, there's something about the wistful feeling of nostalgia that knots up your insides.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Feel these nostalgic knots inside you. Now tie knots in the clothes that make you feel nostalgic so you don't wear them again.
Ru_Meaning: pocket, feelings, heart, yearn, miss someone, become attached to, bosom, breast
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 壊 (こわ．す、やぶ．る、カイ разрушать).

  • думы о прошлом, воспоминания
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 十 (десять), 忙 (занятой), 買 (покупать), 衣 (одежда)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ten (十) nets (罒) and their clothes (衣) use their hearts (忄) to look back nostalgically

懐く(なつく): to become emotionally attached
懐かしい(なつかしい): dear, desired, missed

懐字的基本解释

懐
huái
古同“怀”。

懐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
同“懷1”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“懷”，《太平乐府》、《白袍记》、《东牕记》作“懷”。按，亦为“懷”的日本用简体汉字。

懐字的康熙字典解释

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懐字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
Same as "Hai 1".
"Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Huai", "Taiping Yuefu", "White Robe", "Dong Miao Ji" as "Huai". Press, Japanese also uses simplified Chinese characters for "怀".

huái
яп. вм. 怀
Radicals: 忄, 十, 罒, 衣  (soul, cross, net, clothes)
Meaning Mnemonic
Your soul will cross through your body and into the net of your clothes so that you'll be hit with nostalgia when you wear them again. Nostalgia for all the things that happened every single time you wore those clothes.
When you put on an old piece of clothing, a shirt maybe, or some pants, feel the nostalgia that was embedded in it and left there by your soul.
Reading Mnemonic
This nostalgia ties knots (なつ) in your stomach and your chest. Even if the memories and feelings weren't particularly bad, there's something about the wistful feeling of nostalgia that knots up your insides.
Feel these nostalgic knots inside you. Now tie knots in the clothes that make you feel nostalgic so you don't wear them again.
